summary: This is an email chain from September 2024 discussing therapist recommendations for victims of violent crime and referencing the ongoing appeals process for Ghislaine Maxwell. The correspondence involves law enforcement personnel from the NYPD and FBI, and appears to be related to victim support and case status inquiries.

persons.name: Eri Kim
persons.context: Mentioned as a therapist recommended for victims of violent crime, with a website provided.

persons.name: Amy Edelstein
persons.context: Mentioned as a therapist recommended for victims of violent crime, with a website provided.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referenced regarding the status of her appeals process, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.

connections.description: Both are listed as therapists recommended for working with victims of violent crime.

events.title: Request for Therapist List
events.description: A law enforcement official requests a list of therapists experienced with victims of violent crime to share with a friend.

events.title: Inquiry on Maxwell Appeals and FOIL Requests
events.description: Law enforcement personnel reach out to former SDNY colleagues to inquire about the status of Ghislaine Maxwell's appeals and mention receiving multiple FOIL requests and case study requests.

keyFacts: The document is a 2024 email chain showing ongoing communication among law enforcement (NYPD/FBI) regarding victim support and the Maxwell case.
It references the ongoing appeals process for Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating her legal case was still active as of late 2024.
Law enforcement personnel mention receiving multiple FOIL (Freedom of Information Law) requests and requests to present case studies related to the matter.
The email includes specific therapist recommendations (Eri Kim and Amy Edelstein) for victims of violent crime, suggesting continued victim support efforts.
The correspondence indicates some personnel previously involved with the SDNY (Southern District of New York) have moved on from their positions.
